item.title: Data Visualization with R - Box Plots
item.description: Introduction This is the sixth post in the series Data Visualization With R. In the previous post, we learnt how to build bar plots. In this post, we will learn to create univariate/multivariate box plots interpret box plots create horizontal box plots detect outliers modify box color use formula to compare distributions of different variables use notches to compare medians Libraries, Code & Data All the data sets used in this post can be found here and code can be downloaded from here.
